alert.note: Alert for Bent; Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 06 at 9:23PM MDT until July 07 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 1230 AM MDT. * At 923 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Flash flooding has been observed with this storm system in La Junta. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Las Animas, Eads, Haswell, Hasty, McClave, Sweetwater Reservoir, Neegronda Reservoir, John Martin Reservoir, Blue Lake, Neeoshe Reservoir, Queens Reservoir, Arlington, Chivington, Brandon, Caddoa and Fort Lyon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
